title: This Is Your Left
description: A program for those who can’t tell their right from their left. It’s funny if you like public television.
quote: This is your left, that’s your left. This is your left, that’s your left!
altHero: a puppet of a boy in a striped shirt in front of a psychedelic background
alt1: the puppet raises his foot and the word “Left” scrolls across the bottom
alt2: the puppet’s feet and the word “Right”
alt3: the puppet tilts his head, the background is four tilted smiley faces
alt4: a closeup of the puppet waving
